News and developments from Justia and the tech world -----
June 2020

Welcome to the Second Edition of 
The Justia Insider!

We are pleased to release the second issue of the Justia Insider, our monthly employee newsletter. We want to make Justia the best place for you to work and grow professionally. Your participation is truly important, so our editorial team looks forward to receiving your feedback and invites you to actively participate in the next edition.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

First PPC Monthly Report Sent

After several months of development, we automated and delivered the first report for our PPC clients. This report will be sent to PPC clients in the same way we send reports for Web and Blog clients each month. Thank you to everybody who was involved in making it happen!

Avanza’s First 25 Blog Posts

Since its launch on April 23rd of this year, our Spanish blog Avanza now has its first 25 blog posts published. We will continue including the most popular and recent posts from Onward for all of the Spanish-speaking community.

Automated QA for the Lawyer Directory

We now have a tool that automatically scans our directory to detect and report errors and data inconsistencies. This is crucial to offer a reliable and safe product for our clients and free up time for our team.

upcoming holidays

Dates to Remember

Independence Day, one of America’s biggest holidays, commemorates the Declaration of Independence of the United States on July 4, 1776. It is often known as “the Fourth of July.”

REVIEWs & RECOMMENDATIONs

The Last Dance

"A fascinating and insightful look behind the scenes of the 90's Chicago Bulls. It is an interesting narrative about Michael Jordan, his traits and flaws and the dynamics with the rest of the team. I admire the level of determination and commitment that MJ strived for and the way he pulled and challenged his teammates to believe wholeheartedly to accomplish the common goal."

- Miguel Berlanga

All episodes available to stream on:
Netflix | ESPN | Hulu | YouTube TV
Watch the trailer

Collaborators: Miguel Berlanga, Donovan Coronado, Haydee Garcia, Alejandra Medina, Lauren Moskie, Rene Peralta & Jose Ramos
